categories: Category:Sith in the Lost Tribe of Sith

nodes.text: A Sith communications officer served aboard the ChaseMaster frigate Black Wave under Sith Saber Gavar Khai in the Lost Tribe of Sith's fleet around 44 ABY. After a failed mission to kill the Jedi Luke Skywalker and defeat or capture the dark side entity Abeloth, the officer received a message from Abeloth with the proposition of an alliance and alerted Khai to the matter.
